Actions.Text: property stopVideo : "Exit Minimal View"property startVideo : "Enter Minimal View"if application "zoom.us" is running then	tell application "System Events"		tell application process "zoom.us"			if exists (menu item stopVideo of menu 1 of menu bar item "Meeting" of menu bar 1) then				click menu item stopVideo of menu 1 of menu bar item "Meeting" of menu bar 1			else				click menu item startVideo of menu 1 of menu bar item "Meeting" of menu bar 1			end if		end tell	end tellend if
